subject: College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: The producer of some early-season tournaments announced it would start a 16-team postseason event that will augment the N.C.A.A. and the National Invitation tournaments. The College Basketball Invitational will be staged in March by The Gazelle Group, based in Princeton, N.J. The organization runs the 2K Sports College Hoop Classic and the O’Reilly Auto Parts CBE Classic. The new event intends to compete with the N.I.T. for teams that do not make the N.C.A.A.’s field of 65.
